item.title: A little bug
item.dc:creator: @mariuswb mariuswb
item.description:
@mariuswb wrote:

I got a funny bug… when i login my serv this happens

when i close source, running a new source, logging in, closing source and run my own source, its ok again.
Any ways to fix? :S

[code]My TutorialReveal() { looks like this…

public void TutorialReveal() {

	outStream.createFrame(107);			// resets something in the client
if(tutsidebar >= 3) {
	setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 6) {
	setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 2) {
	setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 7) {
	setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 9) {
	setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 12) {
            if(ancients == 0)
            {
	setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
	setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);
            }
            if(ancients == 1)
            {
	setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
	setSidebarInterface(7, 1151);
            }
	setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);	// what is this?
}
if(tutsidebar >= 10) {
	setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 11) {
	setSidebarInterface(9, 5715);
}
	setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
if(tutsidebar >= 1) {
	setSidebarInterface(11, 904);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 5) {
	setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 4) {
	setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
}
if(tutsidebar >= 8) {
	setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);
}

}[/code]
